page.title: 19Tachnacryl Limited
page.content: My dad is the manager of a factory called Technacryl. It has been in existence for eighteen years. They make acrylic furniture. They buy perspex and manufacture it into various goods like coffee tables, dining tables, chairs, pencil holders and signs. They sell some goods abroad. The factory used to be stables which have now been changed into workshops. Ten people work there altogether. Two boys who live near sometimes help. There are seven workshops. The perspex is cut in one and sent into another to be made into furniture. There is another workshop for polishing the furniture and quite a big one for packing. It is wrapped in bubble_craft which is a sort of polythene with bubbles, which keeps the furniture safe while it is being transported.
